channel.title: Hi... I'm new to this whole thing
channel.description:
:( i quit mopar and stuff because i had no clue what i was doing, can somebody help like tell me where to write a script and how to write one? like a basic script from rpg maker vx like..
to say the characters name, you put \n[x] x= change the number to the character orders meaning slot 1 of characters would be ralph so he would say
"ralph, go to dungeon dori" or somthing.. and how to add pk would help.. anything would help and thanks, when i joined first here, people kept saying i shouldn't even try it if i don't know about scripting but learning it is how you know it

item.title: Hi... I'm new to this whole thing
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Metamorphoze, post:1, topic:243148”] i quit mopar and stuff because i had no clue what i was doing, can somebody help like tell me where to write a script and how to write one? like a basic script from rpg maker vx like…

to say the characters name, you put \n[x]
x= change the number to the character orders meaning slot 1 of characters would be ralph so he would say

“ralph, go to dungeon dori” or somthing… and how to add pk would help… anything would help and thanks, when i joined first here, people kept saying i shouldn’t even try it if i don’t know about scripting but learning it is how you know it[/quote]

This is java not rpgmaker script…i have no clue what your talking about but here is a good site.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

Read full topic
